subdivision_of_building:
The only areas of the proposal affecting the existing building is the installation of PV panels on its roof and the SuDS proposals. All other proposed changes are external, landscape works and will not impact the building itself.

description: Erection of a waste store and storage outbuilding to front, erection of an outbuilding and pergola to rear, provision of two front boundary vehicular access gates and two pedestrian access gates with new boundary treatments and installation of solar panels to the main building roof.
